Name: Mobmania
About the game: Inspired by games of a similar design, Mobmania is a bullet-hell roguelike where you must take down thousands of monsters (no, seriously) during your epic attempt to survive. Defeat various bosses that get thrown at you using an arsenal of unique weapons, items, and character abilities. Can you survive the onslaught of monsters? Here's a sneak peek (artwork may change)!
